title: Shouting at the Sun!
detail_text: <:th_ch0203/>Kanan-san, I’ll be in your care for today!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0103/>You’re fired up, huh, Shizuku-chan. Everyone hates this training plan, though....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0203/>If you dislike it, that means it’s tough. If it’s tough, that means you will definitely get better after you do it!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0103/>Ahaha, that’s true. I’m sure it will get you stronger. Then, let’s start with a warmup. We’ll go for a run on the beach<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0203/>Running on the beach.... There was a scene like that in an old sports drama that I saw on DVD! I actually kind of want to experience that atmosphere....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0103/>Eh? What do you mean?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0203/>Shouting at the setting sun! Something like, “You idiot sun!”. But the sun hasn’t done anything wrong, has it. I wonder why they say that?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0103/>I don’t know either. If it were me, I would’ve probably said, “Don’t set just yet!”. After all, when it gets dark, you can’t practice anymore<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0203/>I get that! Umm, can we try shouting.... after we finish running on the beach? Something like a vocal practice....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0103/>Ahaha, good idea! Let’s do it!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
